title: [INGAME] Eternum Rek'Sai Backportanimation problem
body:
Having problem with Eternum Rek'Sai backport animation.
Once I burrowed and start backport in un-burrowed state, Rek'sai will pop back undergound, short before the backport finishes.
Don't know if it's maybe my data, that corrupted somehow

replies.body:
Hiya littlesnivy! 

Thanks for the report! We were seeing a similar issue with Pool Party Rek'Sai. We believe we have a fix, and that this issue should be resolved shortly. :]
